case.state: Strip Poker? You should know better then to bet against me!
With Vegeta gone, a girl has got to keep herself busy!
I need something to keep myself busy while Vegeta is training!
Strip Poker? You should know better then to bet against me!
Vegeta's been training for so long! A girl has to keep herself busy after all.
Who parked their car in here?
I wonder who'se car that is...
Hey, who'se car is that?
I'm sure most of us won't be clothed soon, Misty.
Most of us won't be clothed soon anyway, Misty.
Yea Misty. Pretty weird that no guys showed up to strip poker.
Misty's right. You would think guys would show up.
Don't tell me you're recording this...
You're recording the game? Talk about making it awkward...
We're being recorded? Kinda creepy, Streaming-chan.
Why is there a butterfly in here?
Really slow night tonight. Not many people showed up.
Looks like It was a bad night to show up. Seems a lot emptier then usual.
I wonder why we aren't playing with 4 players today...
You guys better be prepared for a butt kicking!
I hope you guys don't plan on keeping your clothes on too long when I'm playing.
I'm gonna kick your asses! No offense.
You guys don't stand a chance.
I've been playing poker since my teenage years. I out-experience all of you!
Give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Looks like I need ~cards.text~.
Looks like I'm gonna need ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~.
Yea, I need ~cards.text~.
One second, My son is calling me.
I've got a good start!
I think the dealer has a crush on me. My success can't be luck!
Look at that! The cards are on my side.
Hehehe...
Jackpot!
This ought to be good!
I hit the jackpot!
Dealer's got my back.
This might be workable...
Okay, I can work with this.
This should at least keep me from being last.
I don't see this hand going too bad.
Alright, I can work with this.
This should easily at least keep me from being last.
A bit worrying, but I'm still going to kick your butts.
Yeah.. this is worrying. But I'm still gonna kick your asses!
A bit worrying, but I'm still going to kick your butt...
Yeah.. this is worrying. But I'm still gonna kick your ass!
Not a good start.
Ah, crap baskets.
Well, these are crummy...
Damn card odds.
Shit!
Damn it, dealer!
Where are my panties!?!?!?!?
Is that a spider shake, Amy?
Well, happy birthday Jason! What do you have planned?
No, Trunks, you can't have candy. It's too late.
God damn! How many squats did you do, what kind of juice did you drink?!
So... your arms are technically... ribbons?
Yea, Strip more!
I just read engineering manuals in my spare time.
Is there something special about the locket? Seems pretty extreme to forfeit.
I... don't think that's what that's referring to, Fa.
I'm willing to shake on that, Kazuma.
I spend most of my time running a billion zeni company. I don't have time for sports.
Videl! I haven't seen you in so long!
Oh my gosh! Videl I haven't seen you in years!
Videl! Its been so long, did you do something to your skin?
Videl!? I didn't think I'd see you here. You look... different. Did you do something with your hair?
Hey Caulifla, something about your hair reminds me of my husband...
~Eyes~, your eyes are so cute!
I hope ~Eyes~ doesn't mind me saying how lovely his eyes are.
I didn't think I'd find someone with my hair color here, ~Hair~.
Blue hair? Nice to see more people with my hair color, ~Hair~.
Its always nice to see someone else with blue hair, ~Hair~.
Do you want me to set you up with a hair dresser, ~Hair~?
Looking at ~Hair~'s hair, I'm questioning if they have ever heard of a brush.
Have you ever used a hair brush, ~Hair~?
I'm really into your confidence, ~Personality~~
I'm really digging your confidence, ~Personality~
Trunks, Honey. Mommy's busy right now. Call back later, alright?
Y'know ~Personality~,I'm sure we would all appreciate you toning it down.
You're being a little aggressive, ~Personality~.
I'm really into your confidence, ~Personality~.
Y'know ~Personality~, It's nice to see a confident lady here~
You're kidding me.
This game has got to be rigged!
Mother Fucker!
I know this looks bad to start the game. But I swear, I'm gonna kick your asses.

Its about time you guys get me.

Was starting to think I was invincible.
Well I suppose its only fair.
Can't keep winning forever
I guess it's time I start playing the game for real!
Looks like I get to catch up to you guys, if you keep getting lucky that is
As long as I'm ahead, taking my top off isn't the end of the world.
I'm sure you guys are all so excited to see my panties!
After the last embarrassment does anyone even care to see my boobs?
Looks like you guys managed to beat me.
Hehehe~ I'm sure you guys are all so excited to see my panties!
Hehehe~ I'm sure you're all so excited to see my panties!

Out of everything I guess my shirt would be the smartest choice.

Well, It looks like you guys managed to beat me.
Damn it.

Fine, I guess I'll show you my panties.
